description: Finally its here, right in the heart of Arizona. A burger and burrito together, what an amazing creation. There may have been doubt, folks may have said it couldn't be done, but BurgerRito has accomplished the impossible. Introducing the original Mexican Hamburger, and it is nothing short of delicious.  This special edible dream-come-true is made up of a large flour tortilla topped with creamy refried beans, a juicy quarter-pound beef patty, a stew of New Mexico hatch green chile with pork, and shredded cheese. Roll it all up and youâve got yourself a beautifully tasty BurgerRito, all thanks to Tucson's own groundbreaking truck. For this and much more, hurry over to BurgerRito for food so awesome, youâll have to taste it to believe.
name: BurgerRito
